Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Scare_00>I'm working as fast as I can! Please, just
give me a little more time!<sp:0:4:0>...Wait. You're not one of them.
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>Hey!<sp:5:1:0> We're in trouble here! <sp:5:0:0>That thing's
not messing around!
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>You chased off the Yiga Clan? You mean...
I can get out of here?<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>HURRAH!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>Those Yiga guys were forcing me to make
weird outfits for them. It was awful!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>Why me? <sp:5:0:0>Your guess is as good as mine!<sp:0:4:0>Maybe because of my reputation for
flashy fashion. I only let Cece-brand
threads touch this body.
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Hm... <sp:5:0:0>I don't want this mask I made to fall into
their hands, but I can't bring it with me.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Say, would you want to take this?
Failed00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Tired_00>Whew... <sp:5:0:0>That was dangerous.<sp:5:1:0> Good thing
I survived, for my sake and Nobo's...
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>That thing is decidedly NOT my style,
but if it's yours, more power to you.<sp:0:4:0>I'm actually dressed like this so that
I can confess my feelings to the woman
who stole my heart.
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Her name is Nobo. She's beautiful, with a
fashion sense that rivals my own.<sp:0:4:0>She's probably at a stable somewhere...<sp:5:1:0>
I think. Maybe.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>At any rate, we're meant to be, so I know
that fate will guide me toward her.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>Take care now. I hope you find someone
to love too!
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0400>Wait just a minute! Your pouch! It's full!


<sp:3:0:2:0000>I'll stash this away so no one finds it.
Make some room and come back, OK?
ComNakedCheck_W_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>Nope, nope, nope.<sp:5:1:0> Don't you come talk to
me looking like that. I can't be seen with
someone who cares so little for clothing.
I'm not saying you have to dress fancy,
but at least put on a shirt or some
trousers, you know?
ComStylishTalk_007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We meet again! <sp:5:0:0>You look fantastic.
Seriously, I'm loving this outfit.

Me, I'm up to the same old thing—
looking for <clr:0000>Misko's treasure<clr:ffff> so I can
confess my love to Nobo with style!
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>Whoa, that was close!<sp:5:0:0> If I fell in battle,
it would break Nobo's heart!
SavedLv3_00: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>Wow, that was amazing!<sp:5:0:0> You're so strong!
ComStylishTalk_008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We meet again! <sp:5:0:0>Two guys who do their
traveling late at night.<sp:5:0:0> You look fantastic.<sp:0:4:0>I'm up to the same old thing—looking for
<clr:0000>Misko's treasure<clr:ffff> so I can confess my love
to Nobo with a stylish gift!
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you!<sp:5:1:0> That was close. If I lost my
life before I could tell my Nobo I love
her...why, I'd simply die!
SavedLv2_01: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Once again you save my hide.<sp:5:0:0> Amazing!
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Ease>I knew it...<sp:5:0:0> As long as you have love in
your heart, nothing can hurt you!
Atacked00:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Scare>I...<sp:5:0:0> I can't be done in here!<sp:5:1:0> Not until I've
told my Nobo how I really feel!
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Here's a thank-you present. <sp:5:0:0>No need to
thank me for it! That's too much thanking!<sp:5:1:0>
